titleStmt.title: Delia and Rosamond augmented Cleopatra by Samuel Daniel.
Delia
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By James Roberts and Edward Allde] for Simon Waterson, and are to be sold in Paules Church-yarde at the signe of the Crowne,

notesStmt.note: "The complaynt of Rosamond" and "The tragedie of Cleopatra" have separate divisional title pages, the second dated; register is continuous.
Identified as STC 6254 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

body.p: Editor's noteThe text of Daniel's Cleopatra, originally published here, appears in the EarlyPrint corpus as a separate document under its own name and with the filename A19816_03.
